label: outsourcedIndicator
comment: The indication of whether or not this specified inspection is outsourced.
The indication of whether or not this sustainability inspection is outsourced.

domainIncludes.comment: The process of performing documented checks, such as on materials or processes, with a focus on discovering deviations, errors or faults related to documented requirements.
The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.
